content:
Sure, here's an example of the `comments` property in the `Case` model:
```scss
class Case(ndb.Model):
    ...
    comments = ndb.StructuredProperty(Comment, repeated=True)
    ...

class Comment(ndb.Model):
    created_at = ndb.DateTimeProperty(auto_now_add=True)
    author = ndb.StringProperty(required=True)
    content = ndb.StringProperty(required=True)
```
In this example, the `Comment` model has `created_at`, `author`, and `content` properties. The `Case` model has a `comments` property that is a repeated `StructuredProperty` of the `Comment` model, allowing for multiple comments to be associated with a single case.
